revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L4005A; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 400 MHz |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS1G831CFP-S5; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J9
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = eSATA, fan, metal case, power switch |addchip = High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, SATA II Port Multiplier;JMicron;JMB350;;1;,,, 512Kbit Serial Flash w/Dual Output SPI Bus;Chingis Tech;Pm25LD512;;1;,,, 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC04B;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;3;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2Big-NAS-KW", "0901 750 Rev B" and "LaCie Group" :are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|LaCie 2Big NAS|LaCie 2Big Network|LaCie}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 ''Kirkwood'' @1.2GHz ARMv5 *Storage: 512KB (NOR) Flash, 2x SATA ports, :1 x eSATA port *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) @400MHz SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host, 1x USB 2.0 device ports *Power Source: 12V/4A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.pcworld.com/article/469412/lacie_2big_network_2_2tb_review_attractive_design_basic_function.html ''LaCie 2Big Network 2 2TB Review'' on '''PCWorld'''] *[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_network_v2 ''Lacie 2big Network v2'' on '''LaCie NAS Wiki''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:LaCie 2Big Network 2 Top.jpeg|Board top File:LaCie 2Big Network 2 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
